mapper.update: update address_relation_record set relation_id = #{relationId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, addr_province = #{addrProvince,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, addr_city = #{addrCity,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, addr_county = #{addrCounty,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, addr_township = #{addrTownship,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, addr_village = #{addrVillage,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, phone = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, contacts = #{contacts,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, is_del = #{isDel,jdbcType=CHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where user_address_id = #{userAddressId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select user_address_id, relation_id, addr_province, addr_city, addr_county, addr_township, addr_village, phone, contacts, is_del, create_time, update_time from address_relation_record where user_address_id = #{userAddressId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
